short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks whether the domain of the website is blocked or not

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a simple Chrome extension that checks whether the domain of the website is blocked by the ISPs in India. (Specifically, ACT Fibernet and Airtel)

Click on the extension icon to check whether the website is blocked or not. The extension will compare the domain with the block lists and display a message indicating whether the website is blocked or not.

This extension requires an active internet connection to work. It will only be used to fetch the block lists and no data will be collected from the end-user.
